titles.title: For the relief of Ibrahim Parlak.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
12/13/2005--Introduced. Declares Ibrahim Parlak to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
Denies the natural parents, brothers, and sisters of Ibrahim Parlak, by virtue of such relationship, any right, privilege, or status under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
